verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to the Shoshannim. <S%H7799><s%> A Maskil of the sons of) (Korah. A Song of Love.) My heart <S%H3820><s%> overflows <S%H7370><s%> with a good <S%H2896><s%> theme; <S%H1697><s%> I address <S%H559><s%> my verses <S%H4639><s%> to the King; <S%H4428><s%> My tongue <S%H3956><s%> is the pen <S%H5842><s%> of a ready <S%H4106><s%> writer. <S%H9373><s%>

Thou art fairer <S%H3302><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men; <S%H120><s%> Grace <S%H2580><s%> is poured <S%H3332><s%> upon Thy lips; <S%H8193><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> Thee forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Gird <S%H2296><s%> Thy sword <S%H2719><s%> on [Thy] thigh, <S%H3409><s%> O Mighty <S%H1368><s%> One, <S%H1368><s%> [In] Thy splendor <S%H1935><s%> and Thy majesty! <S%H1926><s%>

And in Thy majesty <S%H1926><s%> ride <S%H7392><s%> on victoriously, <S%H6743><s%> For the cause <S%H1697><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> and meekness <S%H6038><s%> [and] righteousness; <S%H6664><s%> Let Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> teach <S%H3384><s%> Thee awesome <S%H3372><s%> things. <S%H3372><s%>

Thine arrows <S%H2671><s%> are sharp; <S%H8150><s%> The peoples <S%H5971><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> Thee; [Thine arrows are] in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the King's enemies. <S%H340><s%>

Thy throne, <S%H3678><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> is forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever; <S%H5703><s%> A scepter <S%H7626><s%> of uprightness <S%H4334><s%> is the scepter <S%H7626><s%> of Thy kingdom. <S%H4438><s%>

Thou hast loved <S%H157><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and hated <S%H8130><s%> wickedness; <S%H7562><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> Thy God, <S%H430><s%> has anointed <S%H4886><s%> Thee With the oil <S%H8081><s%> of joy <S%H8342><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> Thy fellows. <S%H2270><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> Thy garments <S%H899><s%> are [fragrant with] myrrh <S%H4753><s%> and aloes <S%H174><s%> [and] cassia; <S%H7102><s%> Out of ivory <S%H8127><s%> palaces <S%H1964><s%> stringed <S%H4482><s%> instruments <S%H4482><s%> have made <S%H8055><s%> Thee glad. <S%H8055><s%>

Kings' daughters <S%H1323><s%> are among Thy noble <S%H3368><s%> ladies; At Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> stands <S%H5324><s%> the queen <S%H7694><s%> in gold <S%H3800><s%> from Ophir. <S%H211><s%>

Listen, <S%H8085><s%> O daughter, <S%H1323><s%> give <S%H7200><s%> attention <S%H7200><s%> and incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear; <S%H241><s%> Forget <S%H7911><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> and your father's house; <S%H1004><s%>
Then the King <S%H4428><s%> will desire <S%H183><s%> your beauty; <S%H3308><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> He is your Lord, <S%H136><s%> bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to Him.
And the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> [will come] with a gift; <S%H4503><s%> The rich <S%H6223><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%> will entreat <S%H9134><s%> your favor. <S%H6440><s%>
The King's daughter <S%H1323><s%> is all <S%H3605><s%> glorious <S%H3519><s%> within; <S%H6441><s%> Her clothing <S%H3830><s%> is interwoven <S%H4865><s%> with gold. <S%H2091><s%>

She will be led <S%H2986><s%> to the King <S%H4428><s%> in embroidered <S%H7553><s%> work; <S%H7553><s%> The virgins, <S%H1330><s%> her companions <S%H7464><s%> who follow <S%H310><s%> her, Will be brought <S%H935><s%> to Thee.
They will be led <S%H2986><s%> forth <S%H2986><s%> with gladness <S%H8057><s%> and rejoicing; <S%H1524><s%> They will enter <S%H935><s%> into the King's palace. <S%H1964><s%>
In place <S%H8478><s%> of your fathers will be your sons; <S%H1><s%> You shall make <S%H1121><s%> them princes <S%H7896><s%> in all <S%H8269><s%> the earth. <S%H3605><s%>

I will cause Thy name <S%H8034><s%> to be remembered <S%H2142><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> generations; <S%H1755><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> will give <S%H3034><s%> Thee thanks <S%H3034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
